===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|らい|ひい|yomi=irr}}
From [[w:Amoy dialect|Amoy]] {{etyl|nan-hok|ja|sort=らいひい}} {{m|nan}} (The 𩸭魚 spelling appears in 廈門志·卷五, in "...犀角、黃臘、白錫、白糖、蝦米、𩸭魚各物。". The 雷魚 spelling appears to be the common name.).

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|ライヒー|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|𩸭魚}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ライヒー}}

# [[blotched snakehead]]

=====Synonyms=====
